About the Journal

The Journal of Chemical and Synthetic Biology is an international, peer-reviewed scientific journal dedicated to publishing high-quality research that advances knowledge across the broad domains of biological and biotechnological sciences. The journal serves as a platform for disseminating impactful discoveries that deepen our understanding of living systems and enable innovative applications in science, medicine, and technology.

The journal covers a wide spectrum of disciplines, including molecular biology, microbiology, biochemistry, genetics, pharmacology, bioinformatics, computational and systems biology, Bio-AI, plant and animal sciences, environmental biology, and medical biotechnology. Emphasis is placed on studies that deliver significant conceptual advances, robust experimental evidence, innovative methodologies, or novel hypotheses addressing important biological and biotechnological questions.

By promoting rigorous peer review, scientific integrity, and open exchange of ideas, the journal aims to support researchers, scientists, and professionals committed to advancing the frontiers of life sciences and biotechnology, and to contribute meaningfully to global scientific progress.

Aim and Scope

The Journal of Chemical and Synthetic Biology publishes peer-reviewed research that advances understanding across a wide spectrum of Biological and Biotechnological disciplines. Areas of focus include Molecular Biology, Microbiology, Biochemistry, Genetics, Pharmacology, Bioinformatics, Computational and Systems Biology, Bio AI, Plant and Animal Sciences, Environmental Biology and Medical Biotechnology. The journal prioritizes studies that offer significant conceptual or experimental insights, introduce innovative methodologies or propose novel hypotheses addressing important biological questions.

In addition to original research articles, the journal accepts review papers, research papers and technical notes. It encourages interdisciplinary and applied research that bridges basic science with real-world applications. By fostering the exchange of high-impact findings and emerging ideas, the journal serves as a platform for scientists, researchers and professionals dedicated to advancing the frontiers of life sciences and biotechnology.
